short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All offers and deals in one place. Less noise, more saving

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
eCommerce websites have made life super easy. We can now buy amazing clothes, mobiles, shoes, laptops from the convenience of our homes/offices. The mTuzo eCommerce Chrome Extension is a super smart tool to help you save more during your online purchases.
We scan the web for the best offers at your fav portals like SnapDeal, Flipkart, Amazon, Shopclues and many more for the best deals. So that when you are on these portals, you dont miss out on the same.
Our list of offers also include the bank offers from the likes of HDFC Bank, ICICI,American Express, Citibank, SBI cards, Axis, Kotak etc. You can see and filter the bank offers on the specific portal also.
